q1.text: Which of the following is NOT considered one of the hallmarks of aging?
q1.explanation: Increased protein synthesis is not a hallmark of aging. In fact, carefully regulated protein synthesis and autophagy (cellular cleanup) are associated with longevity.

q2.text: Which dietary pattern has the strongest evidence for promoting longevity?
q2.explanation: The Mediterranean diet has the strongest evidence base for promoting longevity, with multiple long-term studies showing reduced mortality and age-related diseases.
